product.display-name: Napoleon Altitude X 42 Set
Napoleon Altitude X 42 Direct-Vent Gas Fireplace | AX42
product.short-description:
The Altitude X 42 has been designed with the most perfect and aesthetically pleasing aspect ratio of a traditional fireplace. The Altitude X 42 is equipped with a substantial amount of features or options to help make installation a breeze. The only question about your new Altitude X 42 fireplace is which of the 8 fronts, 6 decorative brick panels and 4 log set styles will you choose to make this fireplace truly yours?

Altitude X 42 Brochure

Features

  • See all Altitude X 42 accessories here.
  • President’s Limited Lifetime Warranty
  • Up to 38,000 BTU's
  • NIGHT LIGHTS
  • Premium Blower
  • eFIRE Bluetooth
  • Optional Hot Air Distribution
  • Optional Power Vent

Included

  • Proflame II Remote Control
  • Four Ultra HD Premium log set options include: Driftwood, Oak, Birch and Maple

1. Why am I required to purchase log set and interior panel with the fireplace at additional cost?

The fireplace is designed for use with both of these items. Without them, your fireplace would not function correctly and would look incomplete. These items are an additional cost to allow you to choose which look you like best.

2. How will the fireplace be delivered? Will the delivery driver bring it into my house?

All fireplaces are delivered via freight (tractor trailer truck) to the specified street address you provide us, we do provide free lift gate service with all freight deliveries. The delivery driver is only responsible for unloading the items from the truck, not to move them anywhere. For more information on the delivery process visit our FAQ page.

3. Where are the accessories for this fireplace?

You can find all of the available options on the accessories page.

4. How is the fireplace vented?

The Altitude X 42 is typically vented using Napoleon's 5x8" flex venting or with an adapter, DuraVent 5x8 rigid venting. If you need help designing the venting system let us know with an email or a phone call and we can assemble a custom solution for your situation.
